name: Bomb Mine
description:
In this bomb survival game, bombs are falling from the sky carving out craters into the earth.
Your objective is to make your way as far into the depths of the ground as you can.
The further you reach, the higher your score.
Find powerups to increase the height of your jumps, make you invincible or dig a safe tunnel for a short period of time.

Controls:
- Press left and right arrow buttons on screen to walk side to side.
- Press the upwards arrow button to jump.

Features:
- Destructible terrain
- Randomised characters
- Powerups
- Endless gameplay
